entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
